description: This file defines the Java class 'GetEndpointIdsRequest' which extends 'DeviceRequest'. It constructs a request to retrieve endpoint IDs from a Zigbee device and executes this request by invoking the device’s 'getEndpointIds' method, then sends the response.

classes.name: GetEndpointIdsRequest
classes.description: A request class to retrieve endpoint IDs from a Zigbee device, extending the 'DeviceRequest' class and providing implementation for executing the request.

methods.name: GetEndpointIdsRequest
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the request with a request ID and device EUI64 identifier, setting the response type.

methods.name: executeDeviceRequest
methods.description: Overrides the method to perform the request on a given 'MockZigbeeDevice', retrieving endpoint IDs and sending the response.
